metadata.title: USN-6371-1 -- libssh2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libssh2 incorrectly handled memory access. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6371-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libssh2-1-dev - 1.8.0-2.1ubuntu0.1 libssh2-1 - 1.8.0-2.1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
